# About the course

OPEN DATA - OPEN SCIENCE - DATA SCIENCE. Our era of data - larger than ever and complex like chaos - requires several skills from statisticians and other data scientists. On this course, we use the learning platform for MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses) of the University of Helsinki.
